casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Craig CAMPBELL. No. 252PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 10, 2015. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of November 2015 by State of N.C. for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of November 2015."
